name: Trainer 1
Dialogue: This is NUGGET BRIDGE! Beat us 5 trainers and win a fabulous prize! Think you got what it takes?

name: Trainer 1 after
Dialogue: I did my best, I have no regrets!

name: Trainer 2 after
Dialogue: I did my best, I have no regrets!

name: Trainer 3
Dialogue: Here's No. 3! I won't be easy!

name: Trainer 3 after
Dialogue: I did my best, I have no regrets!

name: Trainer 4 after
Dialogue: I did my best, so I've no regrets!

name: Trainer 5
Dialogue: OK! I'm No. 5! I'll stomp you!

name: Trainer 5 after
Dialogue: I did my best, I have no regrets!

name: Trainer 6
Dialogue: Congratulations! You beat our 5 contest trainers! You just earned a fabulous prize!

By the way, would you like to join TEAM ROCKET? We're a group dedicated to evil using POKEMON! Want to join? Are you sure? Come on, join us! I'm telling you to join! OK, you need convincing! I'll make you an offer you can't refuse!

name: Trainer 6 after
Dialogue: With your ability, you could become a top leader in TEAM ROCKET!

name: Trainer 7
Dialogue: I saw your feat from the grass!

name: Trainer 7 after
Dialogue: I hid because the people on the bridge scared me!
